descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][color=#000000]Adds amongst vanilla many unique ebony weapons,and names them accordingly.
All weapons are craftable in Smithing Forge and require ebony smithing perk.[/color]

1. [color=#1e84cc]Ebony Longsword [/color]
2.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Battlesword [/color]
3.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Greatsword [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
4.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Siletto[/color]
5.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Imperial Sword [/color]
6.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Noble Sword[/color]
7.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Corrosion Sword [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
8.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Crusader Sword [/color]
9.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Light Sword [/color][i](Nightingale Sword Unenchanted And Renamed)[/i]
10. [color=#3d85c6]Ebony Trimmed Sword [/color]
11. [color=#3d85c6]Ebony Rose Battlestaff [/color]
12.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Classical Battlestaff[/color]
13. [color=#3d85c6]Ebony Scimitar[/color]
14.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Corrosion Scimitar[/color]
15.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Classical Dagger[/color]
16,[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Corrosion Dagger [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
17.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Trimmed Dagger[/color]
18.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Corrosion Mace[/color]
19.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Rose Mace [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
20.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Harlbred[/color]
21.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Sledgehammer [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
22.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Paladin Battleaxe [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
23.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony War Axe  [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
24.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Elven Deviation Bow[/color]
25.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Wood Bow [/color][i](Vanilla)[/i]
26.[color=#3d85c6] Ebony Crimson Bow [/color][i](Nightingale Bow Renamed)[/i]

[i]The File[/i] [u][b][color=#000000]Ebony Blade Replacer[/color][/b][/u][i],replaces the Ebony Blade with new textures.Check pic.[/i][/size][/font]

[i][b]
